original_text: Then all the men who knew that their wives were burning incense to other gods, along with all the women who were present—a large assembly—and all the people living in Lower and Upper Egypt, said to Jeremiah,
korean_text: 그리하여 자기 아내들이 다른 신들에게 분향하는 줄을 아는 모든 남자와 곁에 섰던 모든 여인 곧 애굽 땅 바드로스에 사는 모든 백성의 큰 무리가 예레미야에게 대답하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: Then all the men who knew
that their wives were burning incense
along with all the women who were present
and all the people living in Lower and Upper Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 애굽 땅 하굿과 업굿에 거하는 모든 백성이
